price: Sọ pé: “Ti Allāhu ni gbogbo ìṣìpẹ̀ pátápátá. TiRẹ̀ ni ìjọba àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀. Lẹ́yìn náà, ọ̀dọ̀ Rẹ̀ ni wọn yóò da yín padà sí.”
arabic: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ جَمِيعٗاۖ لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul lillahi al-shafāʿatu jamīʿan lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi thumma ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
